What is the purpose of the `getcurrencyconverters` RPC API, and how does it enable wallets or applications to query the blockchain network?

The `getcurrencyconverters` RPC API (final name to be determined at mainnet) enables instant queries of any full node for all registered currencies above a fixed liquidity threshold that contain one or more reserve currencies. This allows wallets or applications to easily query the entire blockchain network of fractional currencies, determine which provides the best conversion rate at acceptable liquidity, and either convert at the best possible rates worldwide or select only better-than-market rates and arbitrage to earn.

What is Verus Vault technology, and how does it extend the capabilities of VerusIDs?

Verus Vault technology extends the capabilities of VerusIDs by adding an advanced time lock capability that does not prevent staking on locked funds. This enables easy implementation of things like vesting, trusts, protocols for theft-proofing funds, and simplifying estate planning. With Verus Vault technology, users can manage their funds, identity, and estate planning in a fully self-sovereign manner, with the peace of mind that they are protected from lost or stolen private keys.
